data.title: Coder Nails
data.responsibility: During my time in coding bootcamp, I sported a series of coding themed nail art as social commentary on the ways the world expects software engineers to look and behave. They re-appear for special occassions.

data.title: Dotty Dating
data.responsibility: This project started as an way to protect my friends' online privacy. Inspired by John Baldessari, I put a colorful dot on each photo in my dating profile(s) - either covering someone's face or simply placed artfully.

data.title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
data.responsibility: The job that launched my time in the film industry,  brought me onto a tv set for the first time, and showed me the joy of a group of creatives pitching in to create something together.
